item.title: Field Reference
item.description: Packages: frisbee.dev/v1alpha1 frisbee.dev/v1alpha1 Package v1alpha1 is the v1alpha1 version of the Frisbee API. Resource Types: Action (Appears on:ScenarioSpec) Action is a step in a workflow that defines a particular part of a testing process. Field Description action ActionType ActionType refers to a category of actions that can be associated with a specific controller. name string Name is a unique identifier of the action depends WaitSpec (Optional) DependsOn defines the conditions for the execution of this action
